content: **drops crocheted top and cardigan in muskat** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the catch of the day cardigan pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl finished measurements bust 76-84-94-102-112 cm 29-7/8 - 33 - 37 - 40-1/8 - 44 hem 66-76-84-94-102 cm 26 - 29-7/8 - 33 - 37 - 40-1/8 the measurements seem a little small but the garment will be very stretchy and will fit approx 5 to 8 cm 2 to 3-1/8 larger when worn **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio 100% mercerized egyptian cotton 50 g /100 m /109 yards 200-200-250-250-300 gr nr 18 white drops 4 5 mm us g crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/82-6-a-catch-of-the-day-cardigan
